typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerSales
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerStream
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(CustomerSales@CustomerID == CustomerStream@CustomerID,
	joinType:'outer',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SalesStream
CustomerSales derive(Source = 'Sales',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
CustomerStream derive(Source = 'Stream') ~> DerivedColumn2
SalesStream sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerSalesStream'],
	mapColumn(
		Source = DerivedColumn1@Source,
		CustomerID = CustomerSales@CustomerID,
		LastName = CustomerSales@LastName,
		FirstName = CustomerSales@FirstName,
		PhoneNumber = CustomerSales@PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = CustomerSales@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = CustomerSales@UpdatedDate,
		Source = DerivedColumn2@Source,
		CustomerID = CustomerStream@CustomerID,
		LastName = CustomerStream@LastName,
		FirstName = CustomerStream@FirstName,
		PhoneNumber = CustomerStream@PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = CustomerStream@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = CustomerStream@UpdatedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerSalesStream
